body: Alright, I'm putting it here some fun facts about the VA for history purposes and : Obata Yui's voice actress (though I do not have the name, it was never revealed) has also done many roles but the only other one I know of is she did the voice for Suzumori in "Netokano". That high pitch of hers, after you get used to it, it's fucking erotic for me. Also, about the animation, 4 episodes have already been released (look it up on hanime.tv, it's easy) but also 2 more additional episodes are just released and I will post link here whenever the ENG SUBS are done. I'll be back soon™.

I still remember fapping to this so much when it's animation came out after 3-2 months or something. But now I'm more on the ero doujin supremacy. I'm glad I finished every hentai, and every genre there before coming to here so I have no regrets. Amen.
This is so amazing and freaking hot!!! I hope this whole comic and upcoming new chapters gonna translate to english!
